## NgSelectComponent.execute() method

Executes actions on NgSelect

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
execute(...actions: NgSelectAction<TValue>[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  actions | <code>NgSelectAction&lt;TValue&gt;[]</code> | Array of actions that are executed over NgSelect |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
